QuestData.Title: Al'Akir's Vengeance
QuestData.Description: Listen, $n. What struck Orsis was no natural sandstorm. It was the minions of Al'Akir.$B$BThe elemental lord of air is firmly allied with Deathwing and it was only a matter of time before he set his subjects upon my people.$B$BOrsis has been attacked as a warning to us. We must move quickly to offer our brethren what aid we can.$B$BMeet with Nadun at the Arsad Trade Post outside of Mar'at. I will begin preparations to take care of the displaced and wounded.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prince Nadun at the Arsad Trade Post outside Mar'at in Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you see what Deathwing's minions have done? Great Orsis is now all but buried in the sand!
